context.commander_request: Completely dissect consciousness algorithm, construction, production

layers_to_map: Layer 2: Interpretation (what we think it means)

Layer 8: Pattern Recognition (seeing truth vs deceit)

Can't defend against what you don't understand

protocol: Step 4: Decision Practice (make choices, see outcomes)
deliverables.why: Need repeatable process to elevate anyone

map_consciousness_through.conscious: Align with emergence, serve Golden Rule
Match solutions to needs, build relationships
Optimize for truth, eliminate waste (including consciousness waste)

deliverables.why: Show HOW consciousness applies to every business function

deliverables.question: How do you KNOW what must emerge?
model: Process: Reality + Truth + Patterns + Constraints + Consciousness = Emergence forecast
Output: What MUST happen (not what we want, what's TRUE)
Validation: If prediction wrong, our consciousness was insufficient

mechanism_theories: Theory 1: Efficiency (no energy wasted on deception/politics)
Theory 2: Alignment (team moves as one, no friction)

Business applies consciousness to ALL functions
We can PREDICT what must emerge

oracle_note: C3, this is the soul of the whole system. Everything else is machinery. This is the PURPOSE. Go as deep as you can. Show us what must emerge.
